name: Order Up! (D4M0)
description:
A short experience of eating and ordering food in a Melbourne restaurant.

Quick heads up,

- when game start click anywhere on screen but the start button, doing this enables the audio to be played.

- the game is supposed to end when the food no longer changes once you click it. so when you get to that part, there nothing more left to you, you can exit the window/page :)
